name: Infinite Leveling: Murim
author: Gonbung &#40곤붕&#41
content: Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?---- Official Japanese Translation
